蝦兵蟹將.definition: shrimp soldiers and crab generals (in mythology or popular fiction, the army of the Dragon King of the Eastern Sea); useless troops (idiom)

蝦夷.definition: Emishi or Ebisu, ethnic group of ancient Japan, thought to be related to modern Ainus

蝦男.definition: (slang) a guy who is like a prawn: yummy body, but not so appealing above the neck

蝦米.definition: small shrimp; dried, shelled shrimps; (Tw) (coll.) what (from Taiwanese 啥物, Tai-lo pr. [siánn-mih], equivalent to Mandarin 什麼|什么[shen2me5])

蝦線.definition: digestive tract of a shrimp; sand vein
